job_tasks.phrase: You will figure out the best methods of prompting our AI to accomplish a wide range of tasks
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the core activity of designing and refining prompts for AI models.

job_tasks.phrase: custom train models to our customer's needs.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions the task of training or adapting models for specific customer requirements.

job_tasks.phrase: demonstrate prompt engineering or custom modelling on LLMs or image generation models
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the expectation of experience in prompt engineering and custom model training for generative AI.

job_tasks.phrase: experimenting with ChatGPT models or GPT3.5 custom models and showing that you've managed to get complex behaviours from a series of well crafted prompts.
job_tasks.justification: This describes practical application and experimentation with LLMs and prompt crafting to achieve specific outcomes.

job_tasks.phrase: Discover, test, and document best practices for a wide range of tasks relevant to our customers.
job_tasks.justification: This task involves defining and refining methods for interacting with AI, which falls under prompt engineering best practices.

job_tasks.phrase: Build a set of tutorials and interactive tools that teach the art of prompt engineering to our customers.
job_tasks.justification: This task is directly related to creating educational content and tools for prompt engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Helping in modelling the tone of voice of our customers in their custom trained models.
job_tasks.justification: This refers to the process of fine-tuning models to achieve a specific characteristic (tone of voice), which is a form of model customization.

soft_skills.phrase: this is a brand new position in which you learn invaluable lessons in an industry that is changing the world!
soft_skills.justification: This emphasizes the learning aspect of the role in a rapidly evolving field.

soft_skills.phrase: If you have existing projects that demonstrate prompt engineering or custom modelling on LLMs or image generation models, we'd love to see them.
soft_skills.justification: This encourages showcasing personal projects and initiative, indicating a desire for ownership and demonstrated capability.

soft_skills.phrase: If you haven't done much in the way of prompt engineering yet, you can best demonstrate your prompt engineering skills by spending some time experimenting with ChatGPT models or GPT3.5 custom models and showing that you've managed to get complex behaviours from a series of well crafted prompts.
soft_skills.justification: This suggests a willingness to learn and experiment with new techniques to develop skills.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement focuses heavily on tasks related to prompt engineering and custom model training for LLMs (Macro-Category B). There are no explicit mentions of traditional software development, integration, or MLOps tasks (Macro-Category A). Therefore, the role is best classified as a specialist in Generative AI.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very specific about the tasks involved, clearly outlining responsibilities related to prompt engineering and custom model training. The examples provided are directly aligned with these core GenAI activities, leaving little room for ambiguity.
